General.Name: Seabridge Gold Inc.
General.Description: Seabridge Gold Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the acquisition and exploration of gold properties in North America. It explores for gold, copper, silver, and molybdenum deposits. The company was formerly known as Seabridge Resources Inc. and changed its name to Seabridge Gold Inc. in June 2002. Seabridge Gold Inc. was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 106 Front Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5A 1E1
